actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of lands, easements, rights-of-way, and complete relocations associated with Canyons 1 and 2 at Wenatchee, Wash.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to acquire lands, easements, and rights-of-way, and to complete relocations associated with Canyons 1 and 2 at Wenatchee, Washington. Requires that local interests agree to reimburse the United States for the costs of all such acquisitions and relocations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of lands, easements, rights-of-way, and complete relocations associated with Canyons 1 and 2 at Wenatchee, Wash.
